Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides for the optional review by the attorney general of requests denied under the Freedom of Information Law
Summary: Provides for the optional review by the attorney general of requests denied under the Freedom of Information Law; provides that if the attorney general denies the appeal, the requester may proceed under CPLR article 78; and if the attorney general grants the appeal, the attorney general shall order the agency to make the record available; an agency aggrieved by such an order may proceed under CPLR article 78.
LawCode: Amd ยง89, Pub Off L; add ยง63-e, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the executive law, in relation to providing for the review by the attorney general of requests denied under the Freedom of Information Law
